code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Modal from'react-modal';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProjectCard=_ref=>{let{title,imageUrl,description}=_ref;const[isModalOpen,setIsModalOpen]=useState(false);const toggleModal=()=>{setIsModalOpen(!isModalOpen);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"project-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageUrl,alt:title,className:"project-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"project-description",children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"see-more-button",onClick:toggleModal,children:"See More"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal,{isOpen:isModalOpen,onRequestClose:toggleModal,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleModal,children:"Close"})]})})]});};export default ProjectCard;
